0.npc_text: I'm Cyrus, apprentice to Kaelen. Need something forged?

player_choices.text: Old Crank says you know about Finn's crates.

cyrus_scared.npc_text: Shh! Not so loud! Kaelen doesn't know... I... I just did what they told me!

cyrus_confess.npc_text: They made me forge these... odd blades. They call them 'Shadow Blades'. I kept one... a prototype. I was going to show the guards, but I was too scared.

player_choices.text: Give it to me. I'll take it to the guards.

cyrus_give.npc_text: Here. Please, don't tell Finn I gave it to you.
